item.title: Kill It With Fire 2 launches November 25
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Currently in Early Access for PC.

Kill It With Fire 2 will leave Early Access and launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on November 25, publisher tinyBuild and developer Casey Donnellan Games announced. It will also be available via Game Pass.

Kill It With Fire 2 first launched in Early Access for PC on April 16, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via tinyBuild:

About

You are the Exterminator on a crusade against the spider horde taking over the multiverse. Blast through the story campaign solo or with friends via online cooperative play for up to four players or jump into a frenetic Humans vs. Spiders player-versus-player mode for some laughs and screams.

Key Features

  • Gear Up and Exterminate – Wage war on the eight-legged monsters with an arsenal of 45 weapons and gadgets worthy of the Exterminator. Will your team smash the pests with a newspaper, burn them to a crisp, rev up the minigun, unleash a rocket launcher, or wield a laser sword?
  • Save the Multiverse – Embark on an epic spider hunt across seven distinct worlds. Exterminate the pesky arachnids in a mysterious manor, liberate a town in the Wild West, explore cyberspace, and descend into Spider Hell. Every level is a unique battle against the spiders!
  • Complete Challenges – Brew magic potions in a bubbling cauldron. Demolish a megapolis as a kaiju-sized madman. Defend a cacti-owned saloon from waves of spiders. Win a drone race in virtual reality. And more!
  • (Also) Play as a Spider – “Okay, all this spider-hunting sounds fun, but what if I want to play as a spider?” you might ask. And yes, you can indeed play as a spider in an online eight-player player-versus-player mode called Spider Hunt. It’s actual humans vs actual arachnids!
